OCD.name: Find Replace Config Service Configuration
OCD.description: Configuration for Find Replace Config Service

AD.name: Tags
AD.description: List of tags mappings. Pattern: <id>|<title (can contain unicode)>|<o (own property) or n (nested property)>|<m (multiple valued) or s (single valued)>|<tag root>. Tag root can be omitted.

AD.name: Assets tag properties
AD.description: Assets tag properties mapping. Pattern: <id>|<property name>|<m (multiple valued) or s (signle valued)>.

AD.name: Components tag properties
AD.description: Components tag properties mapping. Pattern: <id>|<property name>|<m (multiple valued) or s (signle valued)>.

AD.name: Pages tag properties
AD.description: Pages tag properties mapping. Pattern: <id>|<property name>|<m (multiple valued) or s (signle valued)>.

AD.name: Resource types
AD.description: Resource types mapping. Pattern: <id>|<resource type>|<subtype (multifield property name)>. Subtype is optional.
